value.name: ‘We’re terrorized’: LA sheriffs frequently harass families of people they kill, says report
value.description: The parents of Ryan Twyman, who was shot 34 times in 2019, have also alleged that deputies have shown up to their home and family events for no reason. Ryan Twyman’s family in South Los Angeles.

value.name: Surveillance Video From Willowbrook Police Shooting Raises Questions About Whether Deadly Force Was Justified
value.description: The Los Angeles Sheriff's Department says 24-year-old Ryan Twyman used his vehicle as a weapon against two Los Angeles Sheriff’s deputies during the June 6th incident. Mr. Twyman was a convicted ...
